transcript:
He closed his eyes, and immediately a sound of cannonading, of musketry and the rattling of carriage wheels seemed to fill his ears, and now again drawn out in a thin line the mus- keteers were descending the hill, the French were firing, and he felt his heart palpitating as he rode forward beside Schmidt with the bul- lets merrily whistling all around, and he ex- perienced tenfold the joy of living, as he had not done since childhood. 
He woke up ... 
"Yes, that all happened!" he said
